references.paper_title: Imagen Video: High Definition Video Generation with Diffusion Models
references.reason: This paper introduces Imagen Video, a foundational model for high-definition video generation using diffusion models, which is directly leveraged by the current work.

references.paper_title: FIFO-Diffusion: Generating Infinite Videos from Text without Training
references.reason: This paper proposes FIFO-Diffusion, a crucial precursor to the current work that provides a baseline method for tuning-free long video generation, which the current research builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: FreeNoise: Tuning-Free Longer Video Diffusion via Noise Rescheduling
references.reason: This paper introduces FreeNoise, a competing tuning-free long video generation method, which provides context for the current work's improvements in terms of content consistency and visual coherence.

references.paper_title: VideoCrafter1: Open Diffusion Models for High-Quality Video Generation
references.reason: This paper presents VideoCrafter1, the base text-to-video diffusion model used in the current work, establishing a foundation for its long video generation exploration.

references.paper_title: VBench: Comprehensive Benchmark Suite for Video Generative Models
references.reason: This paper introduces VBench, the benchmark dataset used for evaluating the performance of long video generation models, providing a standard metric for comparing different approaches.
